description: Approval of Condition 1 (Materials, Colour and Texture of External Finish) of Planning Permission ref: 20/02327/NMA (Non Material Amendment to Planning Permission 19/01980/FUL (Demolition of existing buildings and redevelopment of site to provide nine new dwellinghouses with associated boundary treatment, amenity space, refuse stores and cycle provisions along with associated parking), Condition 4 (Materials, colour and texture of external finish) for rewording to allow commencement of development prior to confirming full details of materials, colour and texture of external finishes of the buildings) dated 14/10/2020
decision_conditions: The assessment of this application is based on measurements taken from the submitted drawings / plans. If it transpires that the drawings / plans submitted are incorrect this would nullify the validity of this decision and you are advised to submit a fresh application with the correct information / drawings.

Please revise Validation Checklist with updated information. The new Validation Local List and checklists can be obtained via the council's website: https://www.kingston.gov.uk/downloads/download/261/validation-requirements-for-planning-applications
